item.description:
We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on an exciting overland group tour to Tibet and Nepal (with a stop at the amazing Taj Mahal in India)!

Join the club on a group tour Oct 28 - Nov 13, 2010 to Tibet & Nepal! This is an exciting 17 day drive through the heart of the Himalaya, with a stop at Mt Everest Base Camp in Tibet and a pre-trip stop at the Taj Mahal in India. This is an incredible group tour for those who wish to see the best of Tibet and Nepal with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Tour Price: $3,643*
Group Airfare: $1,949** (to/from New York - JFK)

**For the convenience of the group, we have arranged round trip international group airfare to/from New York (JFK). This is an additional cost of $1,949
*NO Single Supplement charge unless you specifically request a single room to yourself

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Demand for this trip is very high and space is limited. Be sure to get your spot early, as spaces will go very quickly!

Highlights:
* Group airfare starting and ending at JFK in New York
* Excursion to Mt. Everest Base Camp in Tibet
* Passing through the mighty Himalayan range in comfortable 4X4 Land Cruisers
* Scenic flight over the Himalaya with views of Mt. Everest
* Visits to numerous active Tibetan monasteries that date back thousands of years
* Spectacular views of mother nature at her best and of an ancient civilization that has changed little over the past 1,000+ years
* A visit to the beautiful Taj Mahal, one of the Seven Wonders of the World
* A chance to explore the exotic city of Kathmandu, Nepal
* Breakfast in Tibet
* 4 star hotel in Delhi, India
* Comfortable mid-range hotels and guesthouses in Nepal and Tibet


Places Visited: Lhasa, Tibet, Mt. Everest Base Camp, Kathmandu, Nepal, Himalayan Mountains, Taj Mahal, Delhi, Agra, India

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This tour is being organized by The Global Expeditions Club. For more information, visit our website or contact us at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

Make Friends. Travel the WorldÂ®
item.name: Tibet & Nepal: A Group Expedition Through the Himalaya - 17 Days
